ShishirPatil/gorilla

connects language models to tons of APIs for tool use

Related repos

  • Run large language models locally, manage and interact with different model types
  • toolkit for finetuning large language models like Llama and Mistral on your own machine
  • API playground for learning and testing in any language
  • Run large language models in a browser
  • chat-based open-source assistant that can run language models and connect with other apps
  • curated list of large language model papers, tools, and resources
  • Python library for using different language model APIs with one interface
  • Serving framework for language and vision models
  • Code repository for Hands-On Large Language Models book
  • AI agent framework for connecting language models with other AI tools
